column5: The other day my a/c went down. There was no one home to shut it down. The motor burned up do to compressor failure.  This is where my mount comes in. The Hvac tech is a avid fisherman and love the fish. He like the fish so much, he is going to install my new a/c for 2000. He told me , he sold the same unit for 2500 plus instillation just around the corner.  When my friend talked me into keeping that fish. I would have never knew it would have save me money on a a/c unit.
Sweet deal!
Hey Paul, he probably said gimmie the fish and $2000.....................
I may need some service on my A/C soon....can I have the number of that guy who did yours and can I borrow your mount??  Great stuff Paul...nice to see one fisherman give another one a break!
Its amazing what a common interest in fishing will sometimes get you. We are a secret society worse than masons.  http://youtube.com/watch?v=1dyL-odyCIU
That is a good deal if your paying cash for sure!
hey...let's see a picture of this mount!
I have a hooker coming over on the weekend  can I borrow your fish  you never know she might like a big pickerel.............. and give me a discount
Here it is:    And the unit is in and running like a charm.  I gave the guy one of my homemade bucktail spinnerbaits too, he was thrilled.  Joey  edit:  Oops, posted under Paul again, DOH!!
Yessssss!!!  All I wanted was the name of the lake    Just kidding....that is one HECK of a walleye!
Nice cool walleye.
read the plaque it names the lake
Yup...that's what I was referring to
Not bad deal.
Oh yeah, great deal on the A/C
Well it doesn't really matter if the name of the lake is there Terry, you can only catch sheephead there anyhow
for the rest of my life. will be known as sheephead Terry.........  thanks for reminding me....LOL
Nice fish!  Your AC guy sounds like he'd make a good OFNr!
....I'm still trying to wrap my head around the idea that you caught the fish.
Beauty fish TYBO!
